name: STUDDED ROCKER DRESS
description:
STUDDED ROCKER DRESS. THIS DRESS HAS AN EDGY ROCK AND ROLL VIBE TO IT. IT'S GIRLY YET STILL HAS A PUNKY EDGE. PERFECT FOR A PARTY, SPECIAL OCCASION, PROM OR SIMPLY TO ROCK OUT IN! 

Stars and Spikes Clothing was created out of the need and desire of wanting to be original and unique. This particular piece is from our 'One Of A Kind' Line where we only produce ONE piece like this.

This is a one of a kind dress and will not be remade! To maintain originality we have promised not to reproduce any thing in the 'One Of A Kind' Line! Look out for more unique stuff in this range!

name: CUSTOM STUDDED CONVERSE.
description:
Custom made studded converse.

We customize official Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Top Converse. 


Each pair is hand crafted to punk perfection. Nothing is edgier or more rock and roll than a pair of studded converse! 

Usually around Â£200 online! We are slashing the price and making it affordable!



Stay tuned for our full range of customized shoe collection coming AUTUMN 2012!

We are making these on a made to order basis. When you place an order please allow up to 30 days for your order to be shipped as every stud is applied by hand. 

Please note the shoes pictured are not converse however we will be applying the same unique effect to the converse.


NOW ON SALE! CHEAPEST PLACE ONLINE GUARANTEED! VERY LIMITED STOCK! THESE ARE PART OF A ONE OFF SALE AND WILL NEVER BE THIS UNBEATABLE PRICE AGAIN!

name: CUT OFF DENIM ROCKER JACKET
description:
This is part of our 'One Of A Kid' line. This is a piece that will not be reproduced. 

Bored of wearing the same old denim jacket as everyone else? If so this denim jacket is for you! We have took something fashionable and gave it the edgy look it needs! With custom studs applied! 

Please note this product is only the jacket and not the black top as pictures.

name: OVERSIZED LIGHTENING HEART MUSCLE TANK
description:
Oversized purple unisex tank top. Low cut arms. Cut off messy effect. Great for summer!

You can turn our t shirts into oversized tanks with our customization option!  


Full tank top range coming soon in more colours and designs!! 

Please note this product is a PRE-ORDER and ships from July 16th!
